channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Torrential rains return to Southern California, prompting new flash flood fears, threat of mudslides
item.description: Torrential rains are drenching parts of Southern California, leading to new flash flood warnings for Los Angeles County

item.title: Police say a man has been shot and killed after wielding a knife at St. Louis airport
item.description: Officials say a man has been shot and killed after wielding a knife at St. Louis airport

item.title: Supreme Court meets to weigh Trump's birthright citizenship restrictions
item.description: The Supreme Court is meeting in private with a key issue on its agenda — President Donald Trump’s birthright citizenship order declaring that children...

item.title: Ukraine’s Zelenskyy says he will work "calmly” with America and offer alternatives to US peace proposals
item.description: Ukraine’s Zelenskyy says he will work "calmly” with America and offer alternatives to US peace proposals

item.title: Trump's wind-down of the Education Department leaves schools fearing disruption
item.description: The Trump administration is steaming forward on its plan to dismantle the Education Department
